meanings.definition: A condition in which a loop of intestine twists on itself.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that volvuluses can cause severe pain in the abdomen.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon successfully untangled the volvuluses in the patient's intestine.
meanings.sent3: The volvuluses in the intestine decided to play a game of Twister.
meanings.sent4: The volvuluses were like a tangled mess of spaghetti inside the body.
meanings.sent5: The image of the twisted volvuluses haunted his dreams.
